designSystem.name: zui-breadcrumbs
designSystem.content: Give users context so they don't feel lost, even when they are deep inside large, nested content.

designSystem.name: zui-button
designSystem.content: Create clickable buttons.

designSystem.name: zui-button-dropdown
designSystem.content: Buttons that reveal a list of three or more actionable options.

designSystem.name: zui-button-group
designSystem.content: Three or more buttons grouped together on a single line.

designSystem.name: zui-card
designSystem.content: Highly flexible foundational building blocks used as a container for a variety of content.

designSystem.name: zui-checkbox
designSystem.content: Selection controls that allow the user to make multiple selections from a list of options.

designSystem.name: zui-dialog
designSystem.content: Display a message or content on a layer above the current page.

designSystem.name: zui-select-dropdown
designSystem.content: Type of input field in which a user fills an input box with one or many items from a list of acceptable inputs.

designSystem.name: zui-select-dropdown
designSystem.content: Type of input field in which a user fills an input box with an item from a list of acceptable items.

designSystem.name: zui-error-page
designSystem.content: Display an error page when a user encounters a critical error.

designSystem.name: zui-expander
designSystem.content: A useful pattern for progressive disclosure—highlighting important details of a section and revealing more details upon a tap or click.

designSystem.name: zui-input-file
designSystem.content: Allows the user to select one or many files from the user’s file system and upload to the application.

designSystem.name: zui-formfield
designSystem.content: Group labels and form controls together within a web form.

designSystem.name: zui-icon
designSystem.content: Visual representation of features and actions users can take.

designSystem.name: zui-logo
designSystem.content: Provide consistent branding across Zywave products.

designSystem.name: zui-multipicker
designSystem.content: A focused multi-select interface that is searchable and paged.

designSystem.name: zui-notifier
designSystem.content: Unobtrusive messages that provide the user with a simple feedback alert.

designSystem.name: zui-pager
designSystem.content: Used to reduce large data representation with paging.

designSystem.name: zui-picker
designSystem.content: A focused single select interface that is searchable and paged.

designSystem.name: zui-progress
designSystem.content: Show linear progress when loading, uploading, or downloading.

designSystem.name: zui-radio
designSystem.content: A selection control that allows the user to make a single selection.

designSystem.name: zui-search
designSystem.content: Defines a consistent search bar interface.

designSystem.name: zui-shell
designSystem.content: Wraps around all of our applications and provides suite level consistencies, branding, and common functionality.

designSystem.name: zui-slider
designSystem.content: Visually specify a numeric value within a given range.

designSystem.name: zui-spinner
designSystem.content: Visual representation of something happening behind the scenes when loading, uploading, or downloading.

designSystem.name: zui-svg
designSystem.content: Utility that helps display SVGs

designSystem.name: zui-tabs
designSystem.content: Provide the user a way of viewing a subset of the information in a given section of content.

designSystem.name: zui-input
designSystem.content: A single-line box that the user can enter text into.

designSystem.name: zui-toggle
designSystem.content: A page element used to enable or disable an associated setting or feature.

designSystem.name: zui-tooltip
designSystem.content: Unobtrusive messages that provide the user with simple information when hovering over a page element.

designSystem.name: zui-well
designSystem.content: Messages that provide the user with feedback.

applicationFramework.name: zywave-analytics
applicationFramework.content: Defines a configurable way to communicate with our centralized analytics tracking.

applicationFramework.name: zywave-api-proxy
applicationFramework.content: Defines a keep-alive iframe for the Zywave API proxy.

applicationFramework.name: zywave-livechat
applicationFramework.content: Defines a standard way to interface with Zywave's LiveChat.

applicationFramework.name: zywave-shell
applicationFramework.content: Defines a Zywave-standard application for consistent design and navigation.
